sub_title: Business Consultant. Public Speaker. Visionair. Executive VIP Coach/Trainer. Sparring Partner CEO's. Author.
summary:
REAL ESTATE / RE-ORGANIZATION MANAGER

Carolyn is an enthusiastic, positive person with very strong interpersonal skills. Being hard on the content, but soft on the person
she is able to work successfully with persons at all levels and from any background. With her empathic capacities and positive
drive she knows to turn any person and situation into a positive direction, resulting in happy persons and healthy profitable
organisations.
Based on straight lines and a fixed direction Carolyn in short time realises optimal results. No surprise that she thrives in interim
& turnaround management, problem solving and trouble shooting.
Within the world of Hotel, Real Estate, Facility & other Industries Carolyn has an all-round career. Its customer base included government and industry; her
management functions were on staff, project and directional level.
Carolyn has been qualified as a Business Partner, which in particular in her element, when it comes to interim management,
reorganization, bridging problematic transition periods, problem solving and trouble shooting. She does this, and to the market
and to the client organization, from a fixed line and clear rate and realizes optimal short time very appealing results.
Administrative experience in numerous social ventures applies likewise in her profile.

Personal Characteristics & Skills
● Excellent Management, Interpersonal & Communication skills
● Versatile Management and Coaching & Training skills
● Commercial Focused Problem solver
● Strong Personality
● Excellent People Manager
● Strategic & Conceptual
● Hands-on & Pragmatic
● Quick & Strong Analyser of difficult situations
● Creative, Humoristic, Charismatic
● Solution & Result Driven
● Determined & Decisive
● Conceptual & Analytical
● Empathetic
● Flexible & Sensitive
Education, Training & Courses
● Real Estate; ADB COLLEGE
● Time Management
● Project Management
● Management Development
● Law
● Communication
● Acquisition & Sales
● ISO certification; Bureau Veritas
Languages

THE AUTHOR:
Carolyn van Ravenhorst successfully reorganized collapsed businesses and got broken families back on track. Carolyn’s slogan is “Making people happy and making people laugh,” for which she developed the Positive Power and Happiness!™ lifestyle method. Carolyn is a life lover and traveler to various worldwide destinations. 

She is a Sparring Partner and Advisor for Directors and CEOs and Board Members & 
VIP Executive Trainer. 

Carolyn loves living her life in the Netherlands, Europe, as well as in California, USA.
